itemDescription: British publisher; founder of The Times newspaper of London (1738-1812)

wikipedia_page.main: John Walter (1 January 1738 – 17 November 1812) was an English newspaper publisher and founder of The Times newspaper, which he launched on 1 January 1785 as The Daily Universal Register. He was born in London and was educated at Merchant Taylors' School, then located in London.
